title: Connected to your new device Preparing...
content: I've been trying to transfer data from my old phone which is an LG V20 to my new Google Pixel 5 through the Quick switch adapter and a genuine google pixel charging cable and I took a screenshot of the message that is being endlessly displayed on my LG V20 screen and I can't get the transfer process to go any further than this message:
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 5
